long-description.p: "Love is what binds us all together in perfect harmony. And let the peace that comes" --Col. 3:14b-15
The Women's ministry is focused on meeting the needs of Calvary Austin women through the following areas:
long-description.heading: Bible Study
long-description.p: In an attempt to meet the needs of varying schedules, 2 Bible studies are offered in the fall and spring. One is the morning bible study, and the other is the evening Bible study. Each have their own times and meeting schedules. Learn more...
long-description.heading: Biblical Counseling
long-description.p: "Women Helping Women" is available to help provide scripture that can be directly applied to struggles occuring in women's lives. Learn more...
